verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Yet one <S%H259><s%> plague <S%H5061><s%> more will I bring <S%H935><s%> on Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and on Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> afterwards <S%H310><s%> he will let you go. <S%H7971><s%> When he lets you go, <S%H7971><s%> he will surely <S%H1644><s%> thrust you out <S%H1644><s%> altogether. <S%H3617><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> now in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and let them ask <S%H7592><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> of his neighbor, <S%H7453><s%> and every woman <S%H802><s%> of her neighbor, <S%H7468><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold. <S%H2091><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%> Moreover the man <S%H376><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s servants, <S%H5650><s%> and in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people. <S%H5971><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "This is what Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> says: <S%H559><s%> <S%H3915><s%> 'About midnight I will go out <S%H3318><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%>

and all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> shall die, <S%H4191><s%> from the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> who sits <S%H3427><s%> on his throne, <S%H3678><s%> even to the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the female servant who is behind <S%H310><s%> the mill; <S%H7347><s%> and all the firstborn of livestock. <S%H1060><s%>

There shall be <S%H1961><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> cry <S%H6818><s%> throughout all the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> such as there has not been, <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> shall be any more. <S%H3254><s%>

But against any of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a dog <S%H3611><s%> won't <S%H2782><s%> even bark or move its tongue, <S%H3956><s%> against man <S%H376><s%> or animal; <S%H929><s%> that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> makes a distinction <S%H6395><s%> between the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> and Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

All these your servants <S%H5650><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> to me, <S%H3381><s%> and bow down themselves to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Get out, <S%H3318><s%> with all the people <S%H5971><s%> who follow <S%H7272><s%> you; <S%H310><s%>" and after that I will go out. <S%H3318><s%>'" He went out <S%H3318><s%> from Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> in hot <S%H2750><s%> anger. <S%H639><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> won't <S%H8085><s%> listen to you, <S%H4159><s%> that my wonders may be multiplied <S%H7235><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> all these wonders <S%H4159><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>'s heart, <S%H3820><s%> and he didn't <S%H1121><s%> let the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go out <S%H7971><s%> of his land. <S%H776><s%>
